tasks.title: Connect dashboard to GitHub
tasks.description: Set up auto-deploy from GitHub to Railway for Kande dashboard

tasks.title: Load In time format - time before day
tasks.description: Changed Load In field to show time before the day (e.g., '5:00 PM - Wednesday, Jan 28')

tasks.title: Checklist completion info next to button
tasks.description: Show staff name and timestamp next to completed checklist buttons

tasks.title: Install ClawdHub CLI
tasks.description: Installed clawdhub npm package globally for skill management

tasks.title: Install 20 ClawdHub skills
tasks.description: Installed: x-trends, okx, atxp, linkedin-cli, excel, tldr, tmux, deep-research, calendar, email, byterover, codex-sub-agents, clawdbot-filesystem, financial-market-analysis, brave-images, xai, auto-updater, mole-mac-cleanup, verify-on-browser, news-aggregator

tasks.title: Setup Peekaboo mouse control
tasks.description: Configured macOS permissions for Screen Recording and Accessibility to enable mouse/keyboard control via Peekaboo CLI

tasks.title: Show checklist items after completion
tasks.description: Keep items visible with timestamps after checklist is submitted, disable checkboxes for read-only

tasks.title: Fix checklist items not loading
tasks.description: Fixed bug where checklist items showed 'Loading...' - render from cache when data already loaded

tasks.title: Fix items marked completed on submit
tasks.description: Automatically mark all checklist items as completed when Done is clicked

tasks.title: Security audit - Kande Dashboard
tasks.description: Scanned for vulnerabilities: found exposed weak passwords, unprotected write endpoints, no rate limiting, no security headers

tasks.title: Security hardening - Kande Dashboard
tasks.description: Added: helmet.js security headers, rate limiting (500/100 per 15min), CORS restrictions, authentication on all write endpoints

tasks.title: Pickup checklist mirrors packer items
tasks.description: Pickup/attendant checklist now shows same items the packer checked off, with 'Packed by X on Y' info for verification

tasks.title: Fix pickup list for submitted checklists
tasks.description: Fixed bug where pickup list was empty even when packer submitted - now treats all items as completed if checklist submitted

tasks.title: Increase rate limits
tasks.description: Increased from 100→500 API requests and 20→100 write requests per 15 minutes

tasks.title: Create Jarvis Kanban board
tasks.description: Built task tracking Kanban with drag-drop, priorities, tags, dark theme

tasks.title: Deploy Jarvis Kanban to Railway
tasks.description: Deployed to https://jarvis-kanban-production.up.railway.app with GitHub auto-deploy

tasks.title: VSCO line breaks preserved
tasks.description: Fixed text import from VSCO to preserve line breaks instead of stripping them

tasks.title: Always show location section
tasks.description: Show location section even when VSCO location is null - use venue-name from custom fields

tasks.title: Sort Event Details fields
tasks.description: Load In Instructions first, Parking Instructions second in Event Details dropdown

tasks.title: Change admin password to stronger one
tasks.description: Current password is weak (kande2025) - needs to be changed to 20+ chars

tasks.title: Change email password to stronger one
tasks.description: Email password is weak (Booth123#) - needs to be changed

tasks.title: Kande VendTech dashboard
tasks.description: Build dashboard for AI smart vending machine company
